## ADSR.setSustain() method

Sets sustain level &amp; duration. If the latter is omitted, the current value will be retained.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setSustain(level: number, duration?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  level | <code>number</code> |  |
|  duration | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
